doc.name: qtEffects
doc.summary: Returns a list of QuickTime special effects.

examples.example: if field "Effect" is not among the lines of the qtEffects then beep

description.overview: Use the qtEffects function to find out which QuickTime special effects are currently installed, and can therefore be used with the visual effect command.
description.value: The qtEffects function returns a list of installed effect names, one per line.
description.comments: The effects returned by the qtEffects function can be used as visual effects with the visual effect, unlock screen, show and hide commands.
